a.n: Thomas & Friends: Big World! Big Adventures! XXIII (26)

p.k: While the engines are turning the old lead mines on Thomas's branch line into a visitors' park, Monty and Max tease Darcy for only having one job to do while everyone else have lots of different ones. But when Monty falls down an old mine shaft after failing to notice the danger boards, it's Darcy who rescues him.
